desc: 40 Hidden Finds sells pre-loved & sometimes new items at great resell prices. We sell everything from Men and Women's clothing, accessories and shoes to collectibles and home goods, all for purchase on-line. Everything is in excellent pre-owned condition and ready for you to love. Based out of Montana USA.

layout.text: Let our "Finds" be Your "Keeps". Your source for constantly revolving and evolving Pre-Loved & New Designer clothing, shoes, accessories, home goods and collectibles for your home and everyone in it.
